data.title: F I L A M E N T
data.meta_description: Filament Zine is a music journal. An attempt to document the independent contemporary music scene in...

Leonard Cohen - One Of Us Cannot Be Wrong

I’m Chris Kouvalis (stage name still undecided), and I write songs, play guitar and sing. I have nothing noteworthy to promote, except for an album I made last year which I’m not gonna plug, because I don’t think it’s worth plugging (if you wanna listen to it you can find it on my band camp page, as it’s no longer on any streaming service). I spend most of the my precious time thinking about what types of songs I wanna write, and then, after I’ve procrastinated for way too long, I go on and make something completely different than what I had in mind. Although I am proud of the music I’ve made in the past, I’m in the middle of an artistic “overhaul”, partly because the COVID-19 pandemic, and the isolation it entails, has forced me to spend time with myself, thus making me to overanalyze every inch of my being. Fingers crossed that something good comes out of this shit! Stay safe everyone!.

https://soundcloud.com/chris-kouvalis

Ioannis Gardiklis is a sound artist, composer and electronic music producer. His compositions combine natural, analog and digital sounds and explore the relation between technology and music. He has created various interactive multimedia installations engaging music as a mean of expression and communication with different art forms. His latest work is the collaborative sonic cross-experimental project VEI Scale. A compositional approach to connect electronic sound and contemporary poetry. The single Let’s of this project was released on 11th February 2022 and the relevant debut album will be released very soon (Mar. 18, 2022). His solo musical projects are published under the name Electrohead.

https://veiscale.bandcamp.com/releases

An Average Rabbit is the lead guitarist, songwriter and singer of Halocraft band.

Halocraft is a 4 piece cinematic-post/rock band from Giannitsa Greece. The band was formed in 2014 and since then it has released two albums. “Chains for the Sea” was released on the eleventh of November 2018 and “A Mother To Scare Away The Darkness” on the fifth of November 2021. The band members keep their identity hidden from the public and appear on stage wearing animal masks. The band has appeared in many live stages and events acros Greece and also had a month long European tour on November of 2019.

CONEHEADS - L.P.1. aka “14 Year Old High School PC-Fascist Hype Lords Rip Off Devo for the Sake of Extorting $$$ from Helpless Impressionable Midwestern Internet Peoplepunks L.P.”

Hello freaks. I am Panos aka Blirp Blorp from ΜΠΡΙΤΖΟΛΙΤΣΕΣ. I am 20 years old and I live in the centre of Athens. I am playing music with my pal Thanassis aka Mr. Mayor in our basement. I am shouting, screaming and violating the guitar and your ears to express my rage. When I am not playing music, I like reading comics under the angry sound of farfisas and drawing like an armless child. (If you are interested in playing synths in a style like ours, feel free to contact us. We are a duo but we are looking for a new member) We have another band that is called POLITBEERO. We are 5, we play blues and we are loud.

https://yummysteaks.bandcamp.com/releases

https://www.facebook.com/BRJLTS

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCFfyRQtZqGqCvI6MulLC_g

Hi, I am Kalliopi Mitropoulou, a versatile musician collaborating with orchestras, ensembles, composers and bands in Athens and London with my voice and violin. I am currently making my first steps into composing my own music. I am usually the one that has to ask for a toilet stop when touring. When I don’t make music, I illustrate silly things or try to pet every dog I meet.

Eva Duru is a DJ, keyboardist, thereminist and (sometimes) a vocalist who was born in Larissa and lives in Thessaloniki. She has been involved with music and dance since the age of 6. She studied classical piano and Music Art and Science at the University of Macedonia. She is a live member of Tuflon (instrumental cinematic- jazztronica), Super Stereo-Dzingovic (indie-alternative rock), Johnny Carbonaras (surf-punk), Anthie Kirkou (indie-pop), Oktavision (synth-electropop), Black Light Project (spoken word-electronic),all of which having released several albums during the last years in vinyl, cd, and digital formats. She is a founding member of Five To One( A Live Tribute To The Doors).She has also performed as live member at Coti K.’s -The Man From Managra project, as a thereminist at A Queer Tribute To Lena Platonos curated by FYTA, as an actress and dancer at Dodeka Daktyla music dance-theatre group and Mavros Gantzos and many more. As a DJ she loves, improvising, mixing and experimenting with multiple and sometimes irrelevant music sub-genres, with vinyls or Mp3s, according to the bar, coffee shop, restaurant, festival she is working at, so don’t ask her “what music are you gonna play tonight?” ;)) She dreams of creating an exotica-space age pop orchestra, to perform as a diva with her new fabulous theremin, so wait for it!

https://www.mixcloud.com/DuruDuru/https://tuflon.bandcamp.com/album/tuflonhttps://superstereo3.bandcamp.com/

Hey I am Venetia Ioakim vocalist and lyrics writer of the Athens based duo The Synth-A. I met the other half of the band (Stavros Van der Wilt) in 2019, we fell in love and 11 months later, we had a baby boy and a little later on a ‘baby’ band.

Before that, I was a fashion designer under the brand name cross6 and a dj, playing indie music around town. I also work for KETHEA. Our music is mainly composed with analogue synthesizers (modular) and my lyrics mostly tend to avoid drama. Our 2 first singles were played on some fm and web radio stations. Our new 3rd single ‘your devoted stalker’ is out now!

Youtube

Facebook

Instagram

Jan Van (Yannis) Angelopoulos is a drummer and composer. Studied in Rotterdam’s Conservatorium (Codarts) Jazz Department. His debut album Misspent was released in 2010 and his latest LP “Streams” in 2021. He is a steady collaborator with theater company Vasistas and director Argyro Chioti as well with dance company Stereo Nero.

Dina is the founder and owner of the independent label “Dinara Records”, based in Thessaloniki, which is up and running since 2019.

Her goal is to introduce to the audience the underground music scene of the city, through vinyl production, live sessions and events that the label holds. Her mindset is about creating foundations for the whole scene in Thessaloniki and showcasing it.

For over ten years, she has been attending every live concert taking place in Thessaloniki-by local bands or not- observing the diversity and idiosyncrasy of every band’s music.

She has been an associate of “Ypogeio live stage Thessaloniki” for a year, where she collaborated and became acquainted with lots of bands.

Consequently, she hosted music bands, collaborations and independent personal projects, for several years, on “ToPikap web radio //The music scene of Thessaloniki”, which she is still selecting music for.

Up until 2021, she was a member of the garage rock ‘n’ roll band “Bone Rave”, playing percussion and feeling in with vocals. She knows the bars of the city and a lot of musicians, and she is known to be working or partying ( just hanging) with bands in several studios.

https://dinararecords.bandcamp.com

https://www.instagram.com/dinara.records/?hl=el

Genesis - The Musical Box

Was the Apostolos ever born? And will he die someday? It has happened to billions of people. Unruly life is nonsense… the greatest happiness is union with God. Is art a religion of an illusion? These and thousands of other thoughts reflect this spirit. So speaking realistically, Apostolos loved music and started writing poetry and music from adolescence. Influenced by philosophy, theology, literature, he shaped his world and a strong personal view. Perpetual musical change pervades his composing work to this day. He composes, orchestrates, plays, writes the lyrics, sings. Indifferent to the respective musical fashions, uses those colors of the palette, which can serve his respective vision. As an apprentice producer, he always chooses to keep the old imperfections recorded (in contrast to the inanimate polished music of the time) in terms of position and location. If you search for his work, you will find unexpected musical moments. In 2022 his new work with covers will be released.

https://apostolos.bandcamp.com/

https://open.spotify.com/artist/6jHQzRql9yp8Ai8ROPOIRR?si=SyX2si9QTzuJHHtIqrU9-A&utm_source=copy-link

Daphne Xanthopoulou is a Greek sound artist, based between Barcelona and Linz. Her work discusses the relationships between human and non-human agencies, emerging technologies and spirituality, mundane life, and fiction. Through a variety of formats, she explores ecologies of collective composition, environmental listening, and communal healing.

https://daphnex.bandcamp.com/

https://soundcloud.com/spindle-whorls

Andreas Mitrelis is the owner and founder of Veego Records since 2019, before that he did everything around music business: Band Manager, Label Promo Manager, Radio Producer, Album Reviews, Gig Reviews Promoter and DJ.

Well he still spins some vinyl every week at Mono Bar in Patras or some electronic disco as Dr. Viberator.

He is a record collector and a music digger. That’s why he created the Label, in order to bring back to life lost music or introduce new artists to the world that he would want to have in his record collection. While trying to find more space for his record collection, he is producing an album for a new artist called Lepyr and waits for the next tour of Bruce Springsteen.

https://www.veegorecords.com/

The Pigeonhole Project is a grunge/alternative rock band from Athens, Greece. They were formed in 2010 and their first line up was: Mario Muco on vocals and guitar, Kostas Klagkos on bass and Dimitris Filippou on drums. As a trio they played several live shows in Athens’s underground scene and recorded two demos. After a long period and many band member changes the band was put into hibernation for a while.

Mario, who is the main composer and lyricist of the band, kept the band idea alive for three years by playing solo acoustic live shows enriched with his compositions and many covers. In 2019 and after some random incidents the band took form again with the addition of George Avouris on bass/backing vocals, Dimos Kontovounisios on drums and Lefteris Kavouras on guitar/backing vocals. With this line up the four-piece continues until today. On April 2 of 2021 they released their first official album called “The Plan Is There Is No Plan ”. The album is a collection of recordings that took place from 2010 to 2019 and also including a Remix that was done to their song “It’s Insane” by the Canadian producer Zenchuk.

Since then they continue to write new material which will soon be released and play live shows in the local scene.

https://linktr.ee/ThePigeonholeProject

As a band we are based in Athens, Greece and we formed in Chania on 2016. Our music taste and influences are a mix of indie and dream pop/shoegaze sound of UK & US music scene, and of 2010s bands such as Unknown Mortal Orchestra, Tame Impala, DIIV, Mac DeMarco and the list goes on. Ambush, is our debut album and it was pubished on October, 2019, as a DIY release. We shared the stage with friends and musicians from the Greek Underground Scene, such as Acid Barrets, The Bonnie Nettles, HEX, Nerrves, Psychedelic Trips to Death. We also had our first interview/podcast on Radionotes by John Murch and Cold Gate included on Indie / Bedroom Pop • BIRP! June 2020.

https://berdnturtle.bandcamp.com/album/ambush
